q1: How many hashtags should I use?
a1: Instagram allows up to 30 hashtags but 10-15 relevant ones typically perform best. Twitter works best with 1-3 hashtags. TikTok allows up to 100 characters of hashtags.
q2: Should I use popular or niche hashtags?
a2: A mix of both works best. Popular hashtags give exposure but have high competition. Niche hashtags have less competition and more targeted audiences.
q3: Can I customize the generated hashtags?
a3: Yes, enter your specific topic keywords and they will be combined with category-specific trending hashtags for a relevant mix.
